name: EnglishWords
0:
”Alexa, open English words”
”Alexa, open English words and ask for the definition of love”
”Alexa, open English words and ask for the number of syllables in calculator”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: english words
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The English Words Skill enables you to get a wide variety of information about over 325,000 words of the English Language. The Features of this skill include getting:
- Synonyms
- Definitions
- Antonyms
- Examples
- Sentences
- Rhymes
- Number of Syllables
- Frequency of a word
- Similar words
- Random word
- Category of a word
- Region of a word

To use this skill, activate the skill in your Alexa app and trigger it using the phrase: "Alexa, open English Words"
After opening the skill you can ask Alexa for Synonyms, antonyms, definitions etc. of many words.

*Disclaimer
- We cannot guarantee uninterrupted access to this skill. We accept no responsibility for any damages arising from the loss or use of this information.
- Not ALL English Words are available for this skill
- Our skills or parts of it may discontinue at any time or might contain errors. You use our skills on your own responsibility. Any information should not be seen as an advice.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
